metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8294 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: libyara/re.c in the regex component in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) viaa crafted rule that is mishandled in the yr_re_exec function.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
